715090f-a.text:
West 114th Street, west from Eighth to Morningside Aves., showing the street surface being relaid to Manhattan Ave. On the west stde of Morningside Ave. is Morningside Park; a hilly incline, atop which appears Notre Dame Chapel (right) and a portion of St. Lukes Hospital (left).
October 8, 1936.
W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Art Project.

710241f-b.text:
(1)
Eighth Avenue east side looking northwards from
114th Street, after demolition of "L".

(2)
Same, after demolition.

(3)
West 114th Street, and looking eastwards from 8th
Avenue.

P.L.Speer
April 1928.
